card.name: Mist Rias, Sonic Guardian
card.text: ■ Whenever another creature is put into the battle zone, you may draw a card.

card.name: Parshia, the Explorer
card.text: ■ While all cards in your mana zone are light cards, this creature gets +2500 power and "Blocker". ''(Whenever an opponent's creature attacks, you may tap this creature to stop the attack. Then the 2 creatures battle.)''

card.name: Webius, the Patroller
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ Gravity Zero ■ This creature can't attack players.

card.name: Peace Lupia
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ This creature can't attack players. ■ When this creature is destroyed, you may choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and tap it.

card.name: Corteo, Spirit Knight
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, for each of your creatures in the battle zone, you may choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and tap it.

card.name: Gaga Pikarian
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may draw a card.

card.name: Yuppal, Binding Guardian
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and tap it. It doesn't untap at the start of your opponent's next turn.

card.name: Notre Dame, Vizier of Illusion Shield
card.text: ■ While all cards in your mana zone are light or colorless, this creature gets +2000 power and has "blocker".

card.name: Baronarde, Glorious Wings
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ This creature can't attack players. ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, if your opponent has more cards in their mana zone than you have in yours, put the top card of your deck into your mana zone.
